annotations.description: In this low-proof spin on the Manhattan, sweet vermouth and rye switch places; the former acting as the base spirit and the latter as the modifier. Small m
annotations.title: Session Manhattan Cocktail Recipe | PUNCH

textContent:
1 ounce sweet vermouth
3/4 ounce rye whiskey
3/4 ounce amontillado sherry
1/2 ounce dry vermouth
2 dashes Angostura bitters
Garnish: lemon twist

Add all the ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice, and stir until chilled.
Strain into a coupe, then garnish with a lemon twist.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/session-manhattan
title: Session Manhattan
